ad_text: Olameter Corporation Sponsored We are conducting Electric Meter upgrades in the Denver Colorado area, and are searching for Warehouse Associates. This position is responsible for receiving, storing, distributing and tracking the materials, tools, equipment and products used on the project. Reads and records information on salvaged meters and/or modules and prepares meters and/or modules for shipping back to utilities or for disposal, reports inventory to customers on a regular basis, and operates fork lift and/or hand truck to transport stored items or received shipments. All applicants must be at least 18 years of age, have a HS diploma, a clean driving record and be able to demonstrate good computer skills. If you want to take the next step in your career, we encourage you to apply today! Position Specifics: Must hold a valid driver’s license. Must have basic computer skills, data entry skills. Must have previous experience driving a forklift. Previous experience working in shipping and receiving preferred. Position requires working indoors in a warehouse environment, standing on concrete floor. Occasional working outside for part of the day. Must be able to lift up to 50lbs unassisted. We offer a competitive benefits package. Must be able to pass background and drug screen. #INDHUS FULL-TIME · $19 / HOUR · DENVER, COLORADO Warehouse Associate w/ Forklift Experience Hiring Immediately Apply now
